title: Greek Calligraphy
content:
I know calligraphy is Greek in origins but I can’t seem to find anyone who can do Greek language calligraphy. Anyone have any suggestions.

Much Thanks,

Jason

 [‹ Sans with sheared terminals?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051148/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47469 "Go to previous forum topic") [My Helvetica got stuck in your iPhone ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051148/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47507 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jasongiberti

comments.content:
Gerry is at TypeCon this week. He may know someone.

ChrisL

Jason

You might want to check with the Greek embassy. A lot of times they have someone they use for dinners or functions.

Michael

Contact Michail Semoglou at [http://cannotnot.net/about.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051148/http:/cannotnot.net/about.html "http://cannotnot.net/about.html") . He’s your man.

Gerry
